name: Nrrrd Grrrl
description:
Today was no ordinary day for Fran Palowakski. Today was Star Con, the ultimate Science Fiction convention where all the popular sci-fi shows, comics, and other pop culture converge into one giant gathering of awesomeness! For the con, Fran came dressed as one of her favorite characters: Princess Kartoola of the Blue Fairy Kingdom. The convention was going great so far. Fran had already amassed several hundred pictures, nabbed a couple of autographs, and even gave some blood over at the small Red Cross booth near the convention center's food court. As Fran walked away to continue checking out vendor tables, one of the other con attendees took his mask off to show his visibly sick face. He immediately began puking up blood, and before any attendants could come to his aid, the man leapt up and began chewing on the flesh on a nearby patron, who in turn began puking up blood and began raging and eating the flesh of another person. It was only a few minutes before the center became over run with infected people, tearing and ripping apart those who weren't like them. Fran was running as fast as she could across the floor, narrowly missing the infected who tried grabbing at her, ripping off her fairy wings and parts of her outfit. Fran quickly remembered the token weapons booth (there's one at every con after all), and grabbed a giant mace that she began swinging at the infected, bashing their heads in as green and red mush shot out. She grabbed up a handful of other weapons and locked herself into one of the small conference rooms along with several other survivors. Fran knew what she had to do. She knew she had to take a stand and destroy these zombie bastards before they escape from the center and take over the entire world. She started handing out the various swords and daggers out to her fellow survivors and prepared herself for what would be an epic battle. She was no longer Princess Kartoola of the Blue Fairy Kingdom. She was Queen Bad Bitch 3000.

This polish has a pink-toned red crelly base with various sizes and shapes of black and pink glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. Turning the bottle upside down for a few minutes and then shaking prior to application will help.

For opacity, the polish may require up to three coats.

Picture 1 is courtesy of ColorSplash Nails.

Picture 2 is courtesy of Cosmetic Sanctuary.

Picture 3 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.

NOTE: Yoshi does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out Chirality on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram!

name: Snowblind. CPLE:004
description:
The mall was packed with droves of people walking around with their many shopping bags in hand and showing their holiday spirit by yelling and crawling over one another like crabs caught in a fisherman’s net. Maddie was sitting at her own table at the food court on the second floor, watching the masses. She finished her Surly Curly’s meal nearly 20 minutes ago, but could not convince herself to leave her seat to join the first floor, which had escalated into a further agitated ant hill of chaos. She enjoyed the people watching while mocking the ridiculous consumerism all around her. Signs promoting beating each other over the best deals or ones convincing children to follow false idols from reality TV by buying their shoddy products. Maddie was repulsed by everything the holidays now stood for and had had enough. She stood up to begin searching for her mother when she kicked a pair of sunglasses that were on the floor. She picked them up and looked them over. They looked brand new and expensive, she thought. Maddie put the sunglasses on and fell into a wave of confusion. She took the glasses off and looked around. Everything was still the same. She put the glasses back on and there it was again. She kept putting them on and taking them off over and over. When she had the glasses on, she witnessed visions of madness all around her. All of the signs had been altered to their simplest form, reading BUY, CONSUME, and even OBEY. And the faces, the horrible faces. What was once little old ladies, happy couples, and bored husbands were now disfigured faces of death and all of them were staring at Maddie. She shrieked in terror and ran, letting the sunglasses fall to the ground and slide under the table for the next victim to find.

Snowblind has a white crelly base with various size and shapes of silver holographic glitter. This is a limited edition polish that is numbered. It is full sized (15 mL). The polish is 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls. To achieve opacity, 2 coats may be required. 

Swatch photos are courtesy of ColorSplash Nails.

Be sure to check us out on Facebook and Twitter!

name: Counterintuitive
description:
After she put on her favorite hoodie, Cassie slipped on her shoes and quickly walked outside of the house. She put the hood over her head to block the slow drizzle of rain that fell from the sky. She walked for nearly a mile alongside the main highway before detouring into the woods. All of the trees were now naked, with their once vibrant leaves now covering the ground, but she knew the path by heart and continued through. After several minutes, she finally reached the creek where they would cross all the time to eat at the better pizza joint the next town over. Cassie rushed her walk alongside the creek after she realized she only had an hour left. Once she saw the tree, she cracked her first smile in over a week. As she approached it, she could still see the carved initials with a heart around it. She remembered giving him a hard time about it, saying it was corny and something people use to do a long time ago, but secretly she loved it. She sat there under the tree trying to recall if she ever admitted to that or not. Cassie looked at the clock on her cell phone. 30 minutes until the wake. She continued to sit there in silence as the rain picked up.

Counterintuitive is a black jelly (almost crelly) glitter polish with various sizes and shapes of blue and purple glitter. The base of this polish is quite opaque and the second coat may just required extra glitter placement. Opacity in 2 coats.

The polish is full sized (15 mL) and is 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls.

Photo 2 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.
Photo 3 is courtesy of Potions in Motion.

name: Soska
description:
The little boy stood under his mom, waiting for her to hand him a box to carry. The Harris family had just moved to the neighborhood and into the biggest house on the street, which was quiet and devoid of any neighbors to welcome them. Mama Harris grabbed a tiny box and put some of her son’s toys inside of it so he could carry a box into his own room. She handed the box to little Christopher and smiled as he eagerly ran into the house and up the stairs. When he reached the top and started making his way down the long highway, the sun disappeared in between the clouds and the light from the windows faded away. Christopher stopped in his tracks and stared into the darkness. He began to hear knocking behind him and turned around to see a blue ball bouncing towards him from the other end of the hallway. Christopher began backing up and swelling with fear until the ball finally stopped bouncing and rolled up to his feet. He picked the ball up to have a closer look at it until he saw the bloody fingerprints and dropped it. He looked back up to see two girls at the end of the hallway. They were twin sisters, both with long black hair, matching sundresses and completely covered in blood. Little Christopher began to shake with fright as the sisters began levitating towards him, their mouths wide open and contorting as though they were screaming at him but no sounds came out. As they got closer, Christopher tried backing up but fell backwards onto the hardwood floor. He was frozen in fright as they loomed over him, not knowing what they were about to do. “Cut”, a voice yelled in the background, “that was perfect”. The boy stood up and dusted off his pants while the two women were circled by make-up artists doing touch-ups. The director walked up to the boy holding his clipboard with notes on it and began talking to the boy about what he needed to do differently on the next take.

Soska is a black linear holo made in collaboration with rising cult/horror filmmakers, Jen and Silvia Soska of http://tinyurl.com/tWIStED-tWINS-PRODUCtIONS. Their work includes the cult hit films Dead Hooker in a Trunk and American Mary. Their upcoming films include WWE's See No Evil 2 and the ABCs of Death 2.

The polish is full sized (15 mL) and is 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls.

Photo 2 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.
Photo 3 is courtesy of Potions in Motion.

name: Cropsy
description:
The first day at Camp Blackfoot has come to end and all of the campers and counselors have gathered around the large bonfire outside the campgrounds. Everyone was sitting around laughing and conversing while eating marshmallows. As the head counselor made his way up to the fire, everyone began to quiet down. The counselor stood there in silence, looking at each and every person around the fire. They knew what was coming and some were already getting scared. "Who's ready for a story", he asked, which was immediately met with cheers from everyone. He began talking about the camp and how much it has changed over the years, especially after....the accident. Everyone perked up immediately, wondering what accident the counselor could be referring to. He went on to talk about the foolish groundskeeper who was an angry drunk and mean to most of the young campers. Those same young campers decided to play a trick on that mean old groundskeeper, but their trick went out of control and the groundskeeper became horribly disfigured. Some of the campers began to chuckle at the idea of a disfigured monster roaming the camp. The counselor remained serious and tone; even raising his voice a little to warn the kids that the old groundskeeper swore revenge on everyone. A hush fell over the campfire. Dead branches in the distance began to snap, which made a few of the kids gasp. "He's out there....watching us.....waiting for the perfect moment to exact his revenge....and when he does....pray he doesn't come for you." Every one at the fire stared up at the counselor as he delivered each terrifying word, unaware that everyone was staring at the dark figure behind him with large shears.

Cropsy has a sheer yellow base with red and yellow glitter. It is in a 3-free base with 4 stainless steel mixing balls.
Up to 3 coats may be required for full opacity. 

Photo 1 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails a shows Cropsy over (S)creme Queen

Photo 2 is courtesy of Adventures and Mishaps in the Land of Nail Polish and shows Cropsy over Different Dimension Tubular

Photo 3 is courtesy of Colorful Crack and shows Cropsy over (S)creme Queen

name: Devil's Night
description:
The woman stood up in her bed violently, trying to grasp for air. A sharp pain ignites alongside her head, and then the rest of her body. Her blurred vision keeps her from realizing that she was attached to hospital equipment. Various beeping sounds filled the room. The woman's vision came to and she could finally see where she was. She had been there unconscious for several hours, having arrived completely battered and bruised. She could hardly remember why or how she got there save for four masked figures. She stood up from the bed and fell to the ground, taking the IV bag down with her. It splattered across the floor, conjuring up the image of a exploding vase full of water and flowers that her husband had given for their anniversary yesterday, the day before Halloween.. Her husband, she immediately remembered, was hurt during the attack. She started to remember shots fired, then him falling to the ground. That's when they took off their halloween masks. She pulled herself up from the floor just as a police officer, who had been standing watch outside, came in to assist her up. As the cop encroached, she grabbed him and slammed his head against the bed rail, knocking him out. She remembered the four faces, the same faces she shared laughs and good times. The same four woman who she had known and worked with for many years. The same four woman who broke into her home and destroyed her family's lives. She pulled the cop's gun from his holster and handcuffed him to the bed. She got up and ran to the door as a nurse came into the floor, covering her mouth to muffle her screams. She pulled the gun to her and told her to get naked. As the woman quickly dressed herself in the nurse's garb, she tucked the gun in the back of her pants while envisioning those four faces and filling with rage. The same four woman who have hell to pay.

Devil's Night is a very dark burgundy/brown/black base with blue shimmer. It is in a 3-free base with 2 stainless steel mixing balls.
Up to 3 coats may be required for full opacity.

name: (S)creme Queen
description:
Horatio made his way over the fence and grabbed ahold of the side that been cut through (probably by other like-minded thrill-seekers) and pulled it up to let Janelle through. At first, she felt bad for Horatio when he used his dumb "I'm a professional photographer and want to take model pictures of you" pick-up line, so she went out with him, but after a couple of dates, she started to like him. Turns out, he actually was a photographer. Who knew, she thought. She had finally humored him and was now breaking and entering into an old abandoned warehouse to do a photo shoot on Halloween night. They made their way inside through an opening where they assumed a door once stood. The warehouse looked incredibly creepy to Janelle from the outside, but the inside was less spooky and more old and dusty. She sat down and watched Horatio begin to clean the dust and cobwebs off of an old steel table and start setting up some lighting. Janelle had been carrying a smaller bag that contained his camera equipment, which he took from her, but not before kissing her sensually on the lips and chin. She smiled at him and disrobed from his long overcoat she wore to reveal a petite black dress. She had only wore it once before but stopped because it was too short and kept riding up and exposing her entire bottom region. Just thinking about that chaotic night made her snicker aloud. She walked into the lighting and sat on the table and started posing for his camera. He took several pictures of her in various poses for what seemed like hours. Janelle started to get tired and asked if they could go home already. "Just one more pose....please" he begged her. She smiled and attempted to do a naughty one for him by pulling up her dress before he stopped her. "No, no...I'd like to do just a fun, silly one". She pushed it back down quickly, embarrassed. "Let's get in the holiday spirit and do one of you screaming", he said with a slick smile. Janelle smiled, then widened her eyes, lifted her hands in the air and opened her mouth to let out a small audible yelp. Horatio chuckled and told her to actually scream. Janelle was never much of a screamer, but she tried again, letting a slightly louder one out. Horatio frowned at her, then asked if she needed some help. "How are you going to help me", she asked. Just then, Horatio began to change. Blood began to pour from all over his contorting face. She watched as his fingers began to split open to reveal large, leathery fingers with long talons for nails at the ends. His mutated hands went up to his mouth where he began ripping open his entire face in order for a beastly one to appear. His shrill screams turned into deadly hissing between large teeth. As the light of the moon danced along the building, Janelle's horrified screams filled the night air.

(S)creme Queen is a dark maroon plum crelly/creme. It is in a 3-free base with 2 stainless steel mixing balls.
Up to 3 coats may be required for full opacity. 

Photo 1 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.

Photo 2 is courtesy of Adventures and Mishaps in the Land of Nail Polish

Photo 3 is courtesy of Colorful Crack

name: I Got a Rock
description:
The doorbell rang and the mother made her way over with her large bowl of halloween candy. She opened it to see her friends from down the street with their boy Lennon. She welcomed them inside where all of her and her husband's other friends were gathered. Everyone had been trick or treating for the past couple of hours before coming over to the Henderson residence to have some drinks and laughs while the children played together downstairs and ate their candy. As Lennon's parents made their way towards where the party was, he put his clown mask back on, picked up his heavy bag of candy, and made his way down the stairs towards a closed door. He knocked the secret knock on the door and stood there. It was followed by a long block of silence before a small tiger opened the door. The tiger pulled up his mask to reveal himself to be young Tommy Doyle, who lived in this house. As Lennon walked in, he saw his three other friends, the cowboy, the zombie, and the shape. They gathered around in a circle and started pouring out all of the candy into one large pile. From the dark, another friend, the vampire, walked up with a large box and set it on the ground next to the candy. He opened the box and began pulling out various items. From the box, he pulled out several rolls of toilet paper and eggs. Each child began filling their bags with the items and turned to Lennon who pulled out a sheet of paper containing a list of names of people throughout the neighborhood. The neighbors who stole their balls, or chased them with their dogs. Those teachers who gave them detention and the bullies who beat them up in the school bathroom. The list even had the creepy man at the end of the street who would never give them any candy. All of them were about to be visited this Halloween night; a night they'll never forget.

I Got a Rock is a purple leaning brown linear holographic polish. It is in a 3-free base with 2 stainless steel mixing balls.
Up to 3 coats may be required for full opacity.

name: The Stuff
description:
As the clock reached 2 am, Rhonda and Nick began their third security walk around the warehouse buildings they guarded every night. They chatted on and off about the upcoming weekend but mostly kept quiet as they went from building to building. The walks usually took around 45 minutes, or an hour if Samuel, the third security guard, was working that night. Both of them hated Samuel. As they circled the third of the 6 buildings, Rhoda stopped in her tracks and pointed to a purple glow down one of the alleys across the parking lot between two of the buildings they had yet to reach on their walk. They made their way over their quickly to see what it was. Both were secretly hoping it wasn't the psychotic homeless men from last week who were drunk off of their Viper booze and trying to play keep away with Nick's hat. They reached the purple glow only to find a large puddle of a thick purple liquid all over the ground. Both were entranced by the substance as it slowly seeped from the sewer drain against the wall. Nick bent down and stuck his finger in it, slowly stirring it around while Rhonda looked on. He picked some up with his finger and licked it off. Nick was normally prone to be germaphobic but he could not resist the allure of this strange stuff all over the ground. As Nick turned to Rhonda to tell her how amazing it tasted, he began to choke up until his throat cleared just enough for him to let out a bloodcurdling scream. Nick's face began to turn red and swell until parts of it began to melt off. Rhonda watched quietly; her intense shock kept her from screaming or even moving her feet from where she stood. Nick's scream died immediately as most of his flesh fell off, followed by the dissolve of his bones until there was nothing left but his outfit. Rhonda knelt down and pushed his clothes aside so she could continue staring at the glowing liquid on the ground. She stuck her finger in it and began stirring it just as Nick has done, then pulled it up to look at it. She stopped herself from putting it in her mouth once she turned it over to see that beautiful glow of the liquid emanating from her nail. "Hey, is everything alright over there". Rhonda could hear Samuel walking up behind her as she continued picking up the liquid and spreading it on each of her nails. "Come over here Samuel and have a taste of this stuff. It's delicious."

The Stuff is a matte rubber finish medium lavender polish with taupe micro flakies. It is in a 3-free base with 2 stainless steel mixing balls.
Up to 3 coats may be required for full opacity.

Photo 2 is courtesy of Adventures and Mishaps in the Land of Nail Polish

Photo 3 is courtesy of Colorful Crack

name: Fett's Vette
description:
Lisa took another shot of Jameson as the next patron walked into the bar. He was an older gentleman, balding. He had a cheap collared shirt on and khaki pants with a couple of stains on them. She could make out the tan line on his finger, where a wedding ring should have been. She knew that he screamed mini-van, so she brushed him off and waited for the next person to walk into the bar. The bartender walked by and put a drink next to her. It was lightly colored liquor with a disgusting smell and a cherry on top; something she would never order. She looked up at the bartender and asked "what's this?" to which he replied "the gentleman over there bought this for you". She turned to look at a younger man sitting a couple tables over who was flashing his pearly whites at her. She remembered him walking in earlier with a couple of other young guys. Probably a bunch of frat boys looking to get laid tonight. She smiled back and he wasted no time getting out of his seat to come sit by her at the bar. "Sup," he so gracefully said. Oh yeah, she thought, definitely a frat boy. "Hello", Lisa replied back, then asked "what kind of drink is this?" He moved the drink closer to her and told her it was an Amaretto Sour, which she hated. Before Lisa could tell him to piss off, the Bro pulled out his keys and phone and set them on the counter, while he spouted off some story about his awesome keg stand skills. Her eyes widened when she saw the keys. They belonged to a 1968 Chevrolet Corvette L-88. Lisa had stolen her share of impressive vehicles, but this one was the holy grail. Lisa was focused now and ready to ditch the trust fund baby and take his car. Before the Bro could finish his story, she stopped him, picked up the keys, and told him to go tell his friends goodbye and to use the bathroom now because she lived on the other side of the city. The Bro, with smoothness similar to sandpaper, excitedly got up and ran to the bathroom. Lisa got up, put her jacket on and pulled money out for her tab and put it on the counter next to the glass of Amaretto Sour that now had a cell phone in it. She then made her way out of the bar, smiling from ear to ear once she saw the L-88 across the street.

This polish has a sky blue crelly base with holographic shimmer with various sizes and shapes of gray, silver, and blue glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. name: Potato Cakes
description:
"Welcome to Surly Curly's. How may I help you today?" Janey Glenn's summer was almost over and nearly every day of it was spent at the cursed Surly Curly's that she worked at. "Here's your order of Chicken Thighs and Curly's Fries, sir", she said as she handed the customer his tray of greasy food. A whole, entire summer wasted, she thought to herself. Her senior year of high school starts in less than a week and she couldn't help but thinking she was going from one hell to the next. You know what, she thought, I am going to make the best of this and everything is going to be great. She had almost a full week before school started and there were plenty of fun and exciting things she could get into before then. Just as Janey reached the end of her epiphany, Rick Morehouse came into the restaurant. Rick was the man of her dreams; her ultimate desire, and here he was about to order food from Janey and flippin' Surly Curly's. Janey was ready to die, but she remembered her new positive approach to things and greeted Rick with a smile. Rick smiled back and said "Hey Janey, how are you". Floored that Rick knew her name, Janey fumbled her words and could barely muster a hello. Again, she wanted to die. Rick smiled at her and placed his order, a chocolate milkshake. Janey went over to the milkshake machine to pour him one. The machine began to shake and make a loud clunking sound. Janey looked back at Rick and smiled, while elbowing it to make it stop acting up. The shaking and sounds stopped and the shake began to pour into the cup. Relieved, Janey looked at Rick to smile at him again, but when she turned back towards the machine, the spout exploded and shot milkshake all over Janey's face, covering every bit of her. Against the backdrop of laughter that flooded the restaurant, Janey refrained from looking back at Rick and just stood there quietly, reflecting over the day and the events leading up to this moment. FML, she thought, FML.

This polish has a burnt orange crelly base with various sizes and shapes of white, green, and gold glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. name: Emo Party
description:
Kenneth put the lid down on the toilet and sat down, nervously shuffling around while the party went on outside the bathroom he ran into to hide. It was the middle of summer and Deb Snyder's party was the talk amongst everyone for the last two weeks and tonight was the night. Everyone was dancing and drinking and having the best time of their lives. Greg Tolan, the school dickhead, was there wearing his popular red Michael Jackson jacket he got last year after the video came out. Kenneth peaked out of the bathroom door and could see Deb down the hall in the living room, laughing and talking to friends. Kenneth was determined to tell Deb how he felt about her before summer ended and senior year started, but couldn't muster up the courage to pull himself out from hiding in the bathroom just yet. Every moment didn't feel like the right one...plus Greg was already drunk and probably looking to bash a nerd or two. Just then, the DJ put on Kenneth's song. It was the latest single "Drive" from The Cars; the one that makes him think of Deb every time. This was a sign, Kenneth thought to himself. It was time for him to stop being a coward and make his move....just as soon as Greg walked away. Kenneth came out of the bathroom and slowly made his way up to Deb in the middle of her living room. As he came up to her, she looked at him and smiled. "Hello, Deb".

This polish has a gray crelly base with holographic shimmer with various sizes and shapes of red and black glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. name: Distant Lands
description:
Emma opened her eyes and found herself laying in the middle of a field of long grass, flowing against the wind. She stood up and looked around her. She had no idea where she was, but everything around her was a large canvas of vibrant colors and poetic imagery that began to bring tears of joy to Emma's eyes. She wondered if she was dead and now in an afterlife, but that brief moment of wonderment faded as she stared up to the sky as the clouds and the stars danced together. It was nothing like she had ever seen. The imagery entranced her and made her forget about all of her problems. She forgot about her dead-end job, a cheating boyfriend, and her estranged parents. She pushed it all away for this amazing landscape that seemed to go on forever and forever. "Emma", she heard a voice say. It was a familiar voice, one she was trying to forget about. "EMMA", the voice yelled at her. She knew the voice was familiar but couldn't place it. The voice was shrill and terribly annoying. She sat down on the ground to watch the sky continue to put on its show, ignoring her voice's calls. The calls began to fade as Emma closed her eyes and listened to the wind brush through her long flowing black hair. In the bright and dull office, Emma's boss stood over her. "Emma, wake up!". She continued sleeping on her desk, her snores drowning out the office of all its usual sounds. He pulled her head up and moved her red hair out of the way to see her face covered in drool, then quickly put her head back down. "Why do I even bother", her boss asked himself, walking away.

This polish has a teal green crelly base with holographic shimmer with various sizes and shapes of black, purple, and holographic glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. Turning the bottle upside down for a few minutes and then shaking prior to application will help.

name: Dystopia
description:
2032. The Fall of Earth. What remains of this planet is a post-apocalyptic and barren wasteland. Rampart desert stretches across all lands and the once blue oceans now flow black. Five years earlier, a supercomputer was developed linking all of our countries together to provide an intranet of sustainable energy now that peace was declared. Nobody anticipated the supercomputer to turn against us all. Nobody expected it to make our peaceful planet crumble within minutes. The computer reactivated long dormant nuclear weapons that went off at every corner of the Earth. Billions died immediately with the remaining human population scattering about the dying world. After the nuclear fallout, the computer continued to evolve into an even greater threat when it interpreted all existing human life to be contaminated and set out to destroy them. Now, very few remain save for small bands of people still hoping for our former way of life to return and even larger bands of psychotic warriors of the wasteland, having been ravaged by radiation and now bent on continuing the destruction of the world. This is our new Dystopia, a world of horror without any sort of hope......that is, until a heroine rises.

Dystopia is a light purple-tinted gray holo. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 1 is courtesy of Pinked Polish.
Photo 2 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.
Photo 3 is courtesy of Pretty and Polished Pointers.

NOTE: The Gremlin does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check us out on Facebook and Twitter!

name: Marauders
description:
Before the fall, her name was Susan George. She was about to graduate from medical school to become an anesthesiologist. She had a boyfriend that she loved; parents, siblings, friends. Much like the world, life was nearly perfect, but even during peace, Susan had a unique side to her. An aggression scale that she kept hidden from everyone, along with a worn punching bag and even black market guns, which had long since been banned during the utopia. Now, during the Hologeddon, that charming, happy med student no longer exists. All that remains of her is the dark shadow that laid dormant during peace. She is now The Aunt, an unstoppable killing machine making her way across the wasteland towards the supercomputer and hellbent on destroying it once and for all. The Aunt is mere miles away from the main computer base before a gang of marauders come out of hiding and begin circling her. These once peaceful people, now vicious mutations that dabble in cannibalism, begin to close in on The Aunt, unaware of the violence and bloodshed that is about to fall on them.

Marauders is a grayed copper holo. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 1 is courtesy of Pinked Polish.
Photo 2 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.
Photo 3 is courtesy of Pretty and Polished Pointers.

NOTE: The Gremlin does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check us out on Facebook and Twitter!

name: ED-209
description:
The Aunt, drenched in marauder blood, continued towards the supercomputer crossing over hills of human bones and building debris that once was Los Angeles. She kept herself hidden from the robotic aircraft and tanks that guarded the base of the computer. As The Aunt came closer to the base, all of the aircraft and tanks started moving away from the area.....then silence. Before The Aunt could make her next move, the metallic ground began to shake and open up. As the opening grew larger, robotic tentacles began slithering out by the dozens, their ends equipped with large clamps. It was the mobile form of the supercomputer that people would tell stories of. Many had always referred to it as the Holocaust Spider, but The Aunt knew what it really was; the ED-209. As The Aunt pulled the Atom Destroyer from the gun latch on her back, one of the tentacles came crashing down on the ground next to her, with others coming towards her. The Atom Destroyer was only a single-shot with a 30-second recharge, so she knew this one shot needed to count. She began running towards the ED-209, narrowly avoiding all of the tentacles trying to annihilate her. As she closed in, she could make out the ED-209's mainframe. She raised the Atom Destroyer, aimed it at the mainframe, and took the shot.

ED-209 is a silver holo. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 1 is courtesy of Pinked Polish.
Photo 2 is courtesy of Gnarly Gnails.
Photo 3 is courtesy of Pretty and Polished Pointers.

NOTE: The Gremlin does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check us out on Facebook and Twitter!

name: Echelon
description:
The supercomputer's mobile robotic form was now scattered debris, engulfed in blue flames. The Aunt sat on the ground against the wall of crumbled building from the old world. She had a giant gash on the side of her stomach that she was trying to stop from bleeding. The sun was slowly beginning to rise and light up the dead city. The Aunt could see small groups of people begin to come out from hiding just over the horizon. She slowly began loading her guns again just in case they turned out to be cannibals. Now that the supercomputer was destroyed, can we re-evolve back into the world we once were? Can we go back to that same way of life? Probably not. Everything has changed. The world has changed and so has our way of life. Either way, The Aunt knew we were about to enter a new era. Whether it was good or bad was anyone's guess. Susan looked down at her wound that was still bleeding and pushed down harder on the cut to try and stop it. She started to feel drowsy, but kept alert as the people approached closer. She started to think about her family, then her boyfriend. She remembered all of the plans she made for when she finished school. The apartment she was going to get. Even what kind of cat she wanted for a roommate. It was going to be a great life. Her own private echelon.

Echelon is a teal holo. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball.

name: Gacy Charms
description:
After back to back story times, Rebecca was finally able to get young Tommy to fall asleep. She had been babysitting him for several months now and this was the one of the few nights she was able to get him to fall asleep early enough for her to get in some serious study time. Rebecca quickly went downstairs, poured a late night bowl of Lucky Charms, and began ready through her Chemistry book. Before she could get too involved, the phone rang. She picked it up, only to hear silence on the other end. After a couple of unanswered hello's, she hung up the phone. After half an hour passed by, another phone call. "Hello", Rebecca said to silence again. "This isn't funny, Paul" she said, already accusing her boyfriend. Again, only silence. It wasn't until the third phone call another half an hour later when Rebecca heard loud breathing on the other end. "You're starting to piss me off, Paul" Rebecca said angrily. "This isn't Paul", the voice finally whispered, startling Rebecca. "Who is this", she asked. "Oh, just a friend of the family", the voice said. "Well, the Robertson's aren't home right now. Can I take a message", she asked the stranger. "That won't be necessary. I only want to talk to you," he whispered again. "I can barely hear you, why are you whispering," Rebecca asked with noticeable concern in her voice. "Because I'm right next to Tommy and I don't want to wake him up."

This polish has a white base with various sizes, shapes, and colors of glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. Turning the bottle upside down for a few minutes and then shaking prior to application will help.

For opacity, the polish may require up to three coats.

Picture 1 is courtesy of Rainey Day Nails.

Picture 2 is courtesy of MommiesManis.

Picture 3 is courtesy of Adventures and Mishaps in the Land of Nail Polish.

name: Frosted Speck
description:
Gloria had been playing out the moment when a boy took her up to Make-Out Point in her head countless times the past few years. The moment finally arrived on this breezy Friday night. Gloria and her date, Scott, had left the drive-in theatre a little early to get a good spot overlooking their hometown. The moon and stars lit up the skies and Gloria could not have imagined a better moment, though Scott could've been a little less of a cheapskate. He opted to bring a whole box of Frosted Flakes to eat out of during the movie instead of popcorn and soda. Still, the night was going great. As Scott began to unbutton her blouse, Gloria heard the sound of small branches on the ground snapping. "What was that" she frantically asked her date. Without even looking outside of the car, Scott smiled and assured her it was nothing. He slid back over to continue kissing on her and then another sound emitted from outside the car. Gloria pushed him back and asked if he had heard the new sound. "Baby, it's ok, there's nothing out there", he said, trying to assure her again. It was at that moment, before Gloria could even respond when she watched the large machete crash through the vinyl roof of Scott's convertible and into his head.

This polish has a off-white base with various sizes and shapes of white glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. Turning the bottle upside down for a few minutes and then shaking prior to application will help.

For opacity, the polish may require up to three coats.

Picture 2 is courtesy of MommiesManis.

name: Apple Jack The Ripper
description:
It was nearly 5 am and Giselle was finally making her way home through the empty streets after finishing her "job". Giselle was an escort, one that was very appreciated at her job. She didn't mind the negative aura an escort had, especially with all of the money she took home from it. She was perfectly fine with doing it day in and day out, getting done at the wee hours of the morning and going home to eat a bowl of Apple Jacks without even batting an eye. The mere thought of cereal was already getting her excited so much that she nearly missed the strange whistling behind her. Giselle turned around quickly, startled. There was nobody around. She called out "hello", but there was only silence. She shrugged and continued walking, wishing she had remembered to bring her Ipod for the walk home. The whistling started again and she stopped. She turned and there was only darkness save for the few streetlights that lit up empty sidewalks and closed businesses. "This isn't funny" she said. Giselle stood there, staring intently at the darkness that surrounded her, hoping her mind was playing tricks on her. It was right then when she began to feel someone breathing on her neck.

This polish has a white base with various sizes and shapes of green glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls (mini bottles contain 2). name: Starkweather Pops
description:
The six hour drive was exhausting but Maria had finally reached Sommer Grove, out in the middle of nowhere. She could feel all of the watchful eyes and quiet whisperings as she made her way through this desolate town, into the only grocery store, and onward towards her mission. Maria had inherited a strange Victorian house just outside of Sommer Grove, encapsulated deep in what seemed like a never-ending forest. Maria instantly felt uneasy as she entered the house. There was a chill in the air that made all of the cobwebs on the walls and furniture dance slowly. Maria walked into the kitchen and uncovered the large bay window to let some much needed light into the house. She set her one back of groceries down and pulled out her milk and a box of Corn Pops, her favorite dinner. She sat down at the kitchen table and poured her bowl of cereal, all while contemplating her next move. Unfortunately, Maria was completely unaware of the masked figure in the other room, hiding in the shadows and quietly watching her eat her cereal.

name: Raisin Gein
description:
When she woke, her head immediately started hurting. Too much alcohol she thought to herself, then looked over to see him still sleeping. She quietly snuck out of his bed and made her way through his house in hopes of finding his kitchen and perhaps something to eat. She opened the pantry to discover some expired chips, dried out peanut butter, and a half-eaten box of Raisin Bran. She blew a sigh of disappointment, rolled her eyes and grabbed the cereal. She made her way to the fridge only to discover there was no milk. Awesome, she thought.

This polish has a white base with various sizes and colors of purple glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls. name: Dahmer Crunch
description:
She watched him take the first bite and begin crunching down. He stared at her nervously with small beads of sweat forming on his forehead. Her eyes never left him. Everything was on the line and dependent on this one moment of truth. Several intense bites happened one after the other in mere moments, even though it felt like hours. All of a sudden, he crunched down, stood up and held his mouth and yelped in pain. "TOLD YA" she exclaimed, picking up the box of Cap'N Crunch. "I told you they cut the roof of your mouth!" The man reluctantly pulled out his wallet to give her his last $20 dollar bill.

This polish has a white base with various sizes of black glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls. Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. name: Special BTK
description:
As she poured her Special K cereal into her bowl, our seemingly bored housewife pulled up her laptop and begin connecting with the fellow neighborhood ladies to organize another HOA meeting. The group chat was harmless at first until our bored housewife's dark side took over; a side any normal person would fear greatly. Soon, this new dark force began calling her female legion to arms, thus becoming an army hellbent on destroying one lone heroine by uncovering deadly secrets that go back decades. They do not understand her differences which they fear greatly and now they must take her down. Will she be able to rise above this army of vicious female soldiers, these troll marauders, these desperate housewives? Their leader is prepared to do battle....right after she's done with breakfast.

This polish has a white base with various sizes and colors of red glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls. Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. Turning the bottle upside down for a few minutes and then shaking prior to application will help.

name: Bundy Berries
description:
The woman awoke to the sound of her TV in the living room. She turned to look at her alarm clock. 8:30 in the morning. She knew it was him, the love of her life. She got up to use the restroom, make her side of the bed and quietly made her way towards him, hoping to surprise him. As she walked in, she noticed his eyes were glued to the TV watching cartoons, unaware of her presence. She rolled her eyes and sat on the floor next to her son, who looked up and her and kissed her on the lips. She picked up his bowl of unfinished Boo Berries he forgot about and began eating it while watching cartoons with him. It was little things like this that she would never forget.

This polish has a white base with various sizes and colors of blue glitter. It is 3-free with 4 stainless steel mixing balls. Larger sized glitter may require some extra patience retrieving them from the bottle. Due to the size of some glitters, settling may occur. Turning the bottle upside down for a few minutes and then shaking prior to application will help.

name: Quarks
description:
It was late in the evening and the city street was deserted. She carefully made her way up to the car. It was sleek and the prettiest one in the neighborhood, which made her chuckle when she realized there was no alarm on the car when she broke into it. It was the first kind of laughter she could muster up these past few days since he left. As she made her way across the city to deliver the car to the shop, she sat there thinking about him some more. There's something about him. It's hard to explain. She stopped the car near one of the few remaining pay phones left in town. The first rule is to never have a hot car out in the open and standing still for too long, but she didn't care. She needed to call him to tell him how she felt. She wanted to pick him up and drive through the night, down the hills. She picked up the phone and dialed the number and it rang. The ringing lasted for what seemed like hours and then he picked up...

Quarks is a purple leaning blue holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball.

name: Convergence
description:
Clara sat there at the edge of her hotel bed drifting away into a stream of consciousness. She popped out momentarily to stare out into the city landscape of Atlanta. It was the night of her 10 year high school reunion and her first time back since graduation. She knew only a select group of people had RSVP'd to the event and nearly all of them were the same people who constantly made fun of her. Fat Clara they called. Oh, how original. Now, 10 years later, nearly 80 pounds had disappeared. So did the outdated haircut and her poor choice of clothes. She looked up at the mirror hanging over the hotel desk and wondered if her new transformation would turn heads tonight. Those same heads that ridiculed her all four years. Clara decided that she was ready to face her fate straight on and as she tucked away the sharpened brass knuckles into her purse, she hoped that those former classmates were ready to face their own.

Convergence is a reddish plum purple holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball.

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Absolute Zero
description:
It was a mere few hours ago when Kate, a paleontologist, had left her research base in the middle of nowhere in Antarctica only to run into a stranded pilot named Jack, who also deserted his research base several miles away. What happened at their individual bases is a mystery but it didn't matter now. The two had found each other and knew they could be safe with one another. The snowstorm they were in had worsened though and both were frantically trying to keep each other warm while they searched for shelter in the bleak, wintery landscape. They came across a small canyon that housed a small tunnel which they were able to climb into. Their chances of survival were slim, but they were drawn to each other's radiance and warmth too much to care about their mortality.

Absolute Zero is a light blue holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball.

name: Asymptote
description:
The city was alive and bustling, even late in the evening. A young woman was walking along, oblivious to the world thanks to the distraction of the music she was listening to on her phone, which she was texting on as well. She looked up briefly only to lock eyes with a young man walking in her direction about 20 feet away. She smiled at him and he smiled back. The man was gorgeous and he could not take his eyes of her, which she quietly became excited about. She couldn't help but feel sexier at the thought. With that and the music flowing through her ears, her confidence began to skyrocket. As they closed in on each other, she could not anticipate the car that drove too close to the massive rain puddle next to her, causing a wave of dirty water to wash over her. She was stunned but that was only second to the embarrassment that came over her as she could see the man turn to walk the other direction, as well as hear his not-so-stifled bouts of laughter over what he had just seen.

Asymptote is a green holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball.

name: Bromine
description:
She moved in closer to the mirror in her bathroom, checking under her eyes in her brief moment of being conceited, but she didn't care. It was her 35th birthday this Friday morning, and she had a growing list of things to do before her date tonight with Carl the chemist. He was the rich one. Tomorrow night is her date with Antoine the writer. He was the funny one. Both were equally handsome which she was excited about. She turned to look at tonight's dress she had laid out across the bed. It was a beautiful reddish-brown that clanged to her body tightly which was sure to turn heads. Can I play off wearing this dress two nights in a row, she wondered? Both dates were on opposite sides of the city. Who would know?

Bromine is a light pinkish-brown holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of A ColorSplash of Nails. http://colorsplashnails.blogspot.com/

Photo 4 features Bromine outside with one coat without a top coat. 

NOTE: Litte Amp Man does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Engineers
description:
In a future world, there are Engineers designing and creating everything we know, love and hold close to us. They are emotionless drones, able to create such things of beauty without any hesitation towards destroying said beauty. Things change though once one particular Engineer creates Elizabeth, a woman like no other who causes the Engineer's machine-like demeanor to fade and his human side to discover emotions that have been virtually non-existant all of his life. In a world of darkness, small slivers of light begin to shine through and the machine has now become man, and man is ready to capture love and be complete. 

Engineers is a Dark Blue Jelly with Blue and White Hexes, Blue and Holo micro glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. Photo 3 is courtesy of My Nail Graffiti. It is layered over 1 coat of Zoya Natty. Photo 4 shows 1,2, and 3 coats.

NOTE: Marceline, the Vampire Queen does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

If you have not done so already, be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Suspiria
description:
The American girl has just arrived in Germany to attend a prestigious dance academy. Though the fellow students are a mixed bag of cultures from all over the world, it's not long before they start forming their cliques and gossiping corners. To make matters worse, all of the instructors are a bit strange as well. Soon, our American girl becomes entangled in a mystery when fellow girls begin disappearing, screams of death and howls of laughter ring throughout the halls, and the school's true colors begin to shine in great exuberance. Will our American girl make it out alive?

Suspira has a clear base and contains Red and Pink Hexes with Black Squares, Red Flakies, and Pink micro glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of Superficially Colorful and shows one coat of Suspiria over one coat of Audrey III. 

Photo 4 shows 1,2, and 3 coats and then 1 coat over black.

NOTE: Lumpy Space Princess does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

If you have not done so already, be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Party All The Time
description:
I don't understand why he won't stop bugging me. He tries to buy me champagne and roses and put diamonds on my fingers. Still, I wanna hang out all night, never coming home because I'm too busy romancing and getting numbers from every man I see. He wants me to bring some of that love home to him, but I just want to party all the time.

Party All The Time has a clear base and contains Lavender, Red, Black, Light Blue and Light Green Hexes with Yellow, White, Black and Iridescent micro glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. 

Photo 4 is courtesy of Polish Palooza and shows one coat of Party All the Time over two coats of Urban Lacquer’s Take It Offline. Photo 5 shows 1 coat over black and then 3,2,1 coats.

NOTE: Baby Godzilla does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

options.name: Party All the Time (Round Full Size)

name: Neptunus
description:
Deep beneath the chthonic of the land and sea sits Neptunus, a god amongst men and women, however at the heart of it all, another lonely soul. Tonight, he has cast his eyes up towards the land and spots a beautiful woman shrouded in bright blue robes that bring out the luster and glamour in her fine skin and hair. Yes, Neptunus has found his bride this very night and he is ready to tear apart the Earth to claim what shall be his. 

Neptunus has a clear base and contains various colors of Blue Hexes with Blue Flakies and Blue and Holo micro glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of Superficially Colorful and shows two thin layers of Neptunus over one coat of China Glaze Bahamian Escape. Photo 4 shows 1,2, and 3 coats and then 1 coat over black.

NOTE: The prairie dog does not come with the mini bottle. Thanks ;)

If you have not done so already, be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Yoda Purpurata
description:
The two newlywed scientists head into the water for some deep sea diving fun and learning. The two watch in excitement as hundreds of tropical fish swim by them, some scurrying away in fear of the large, looming humans, and some carefully swimming up close to get a better look. Without warning, the sun hits a spot of clouds, all of the fish scurry away and then the ocean gets very dark and quiet. It's not long before the two lovers see it coming. A large and very beautiful purple jellyfish, slowly floating around them, illuminating the ocean around them. The female scientist is entranced by the beauty in this mystifying creature, however her hubby is not paying attention and thinking about Star Wars instead.

Yoda Purpurata has a clear base and contains different sized and shaped Lavender glitter with Pink Hexes, Purple Shreds, Purple Flakies, and Pink Holo glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of Superficially Colorful and shows one layer of Yoda Purpurata over two coats of Zoya Sweet. Photo 4 shows 1,2, and 3 coats, and then one coat over black.

NOTE: Gigan does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Schenectady
description:
It was at The Parker Inn where our eyes first met. He said he liked my smile, then my eyes. We shared some drinks at the bar. He asked me if I was going to the show next door. I said no and that I had to leave early tomorrow morning. He was traveling on business too. I saw the ring on his finger. He caught me looking but he kept cool and asked if I was going to bed early. I left him hanging as I continued to sip my drink. 

Schenectady has a clear base and contains Black, Blue and Lavender squares with Iridescent Rainbow Flakies, and Pink Holo micro glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of Polish Palooza and shows two coats of Essie Marshmallow with one coat of Schenectady on top. Photo 4 shows 1,2,3 coats and 1 coat over black.

NOTE: Eric Cartman does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Epica
description:
Deep in the forest of Apeldoorn, the song of the enchanted Moura, Simone, echos throughout, lulling all of the lonely woodsman into a false sense of hope and tranquility. She brings them all together into her open lair and before they have realized their entrapment, Simone belts out her final note, unleashing a fiery force a blinding light that takes over all of their senses. They are all now under her control and ready to do her bidding. 

Epica has a clear base and contains Silver, Bronze, Turquoise, Blue and Iridescent micro glitter. The polish has full coverage (2-3 coats), contains six stainless steel mixing balls and is 3-Free. 

Photo 4 is courtesy of Polish Palooza and shows two coats of Epica. Photo 5 shows 2 coats and then 1 coat.

NOTE: Anguirus does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Gazoo
description:
Exiled from her planet to a place where aliens fear to tread, Gazoo now walks the Earth, forced to be amongst the female humans who mock her name and way of life. All of this mockery is about to come to an end though once Gazoo shows them why she was exiled from her planet. The sweet, little doomsday machine she keeps locked up in her title bottle. The female humans can't resist it. They are entranced by its beauty and bow before its aura. Hail the great Gazoo!

Gazoo has a clear base and contains Green, White and Black Hexes, Black squares, Iridescent Green flakies, and Holo micro glitter. The polish contains four stainless steel mixing ball and is 3-Free. 

Photos 4 and 5 are courtesy of Superficially Colorful and show two coats of Gazoo over two coats of A-England Holy Grail. 

NOTE: The cat does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

If you have not done so already, be sure to "like" Chirality on Facebook. You can also follow Chirality on Twitter!

name: Katydid
description:
It's a Saturday night and the clubbers are out in full swing, especially at Club Chirality. Bodies are moving, swinging, and sweating, but all of the men can't keep their eyes off the female siren in the middle of the dance floor. Instead of using an enticing voice though, she uses her powers of stridulation which come from her long, beautiful legs. Once she plays her song of the siren, no man can resist.

Katydid is a light green holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and IS available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photos 2 and 3 are courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: Mecha Godzilla does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Bloodshot
description:
As the clock on the wall strikes 6 a.m., the IHOP waitress makes her way over to the table with breakfast for the three seductive women at table 14. They're exhausted and their eyes are bloodshot, but they're still laughing and talking about the wild night they've just had. True, they're going to spend the rest of the day hungover, but after a few boring days at work, they'll be ready to soak up the night again.

Bloodshot is a red, slightly holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photos 3 and 4 are courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: The evil monkey inside of Chris' closet does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Kale
description:
Our eccentric best friend is having a dinner party tonight and everything is just right....well, almost everything. She looks around and notices something is missing. The table is set, the candles are lit. There's the appetizer, the main course, the dessert; even the option of red or white wine. And then, it hits her. That final touch of Kale to make everything perfect. 

Kale is a dark green holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: Godzilla does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: The Symbiote
description:
The Symbiote is an alien life-form that came crashing down to Earth in search of female hosts to ooze over them and bring forth from its newfound owner a devilish and mischievous side she never knew existed. Once the Symbiote takes over, she owns the night.

The Symbiote is a black holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and  is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photos 3 and 4 are courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: Jake does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Apollonia
description:
Purified in the waters of Lake Minnetonka, Apollonia is the pure definition of sexuality and beauty. She's a no-nonsense kind of girl who will scratch her way to the top to get what she desires. Her voice is strong and can be heard by everyone, even through the rain. With the Time on her side, she's able to obtain her dreams...and even sway the Kid she can't seem to get enough of.

Apollonia is a purple holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 4 is courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: Benson does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Just Before Dawn
description:
In the woods, a killer stalks a group of young, nubile women. They've come off as lost, injured, and scared of what goes bump in the night, and the killer could not be happier. Little does he know that these ladies are far from lost, far from injured and very far from scared. Morning is coming quick, but not quick enough, because these ladies are ready to strike. They're ready to turn the table on this killer and attack just before dawn.

Just Before Dawn is an orange, slightly holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photos 3 and 4 are courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: Stewie Griffin does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Cu2+
description:
A lonely scientist is working to compose the ultimate love potion. While working in her laboratory, a freak accident involving copper, or Cu2+, infuses to our heroine to create an electronically charged Siren. Who says elements from the periodic table can't be beautiful?

Cu2+ is a teal holographic polish. It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball. 

Photo 3 is courtesy of Jen's Nail Files https://www.facebook.com/JensNailFiles.

NOTE: The Ice King does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Iridophore
description:
The sleepy actress awakens from her long night of partying. Equipped with her coffee, all she needs now is her morning paper from outside which is unfortunately surrounded by nosy paparazzi. Without hesitation, she puts on her Iridophore and camouflages herself with that of a radiant and dazzling movie starlet, ready to greet the masses and not give them the satisfaction of scoring an embarrassing photo.

Iridophore is a color-shifting top coat polish that looks best over black. The sparkles include Red, Yellow, Blue, and Purple (depending on the angle). It is full sized (15 mL) and is available as a 7 mL mini. The polishes are 3-Free. Full sized bottles contain two stainless steel mixing balls and the mini has one stainless steel mixing ball.

Photo 4 is courtesy of MakeUpMom123 and shows Iridophore over OPI Lincoln Park After Dark.

The polish that is being featured in photo 3 under Iridophore is A England Camelot. 

NOTE: The eyeball does not come with the mini polish. Thanks ;)

Be sure to check out my Chirality Nail Polish fan page on Facebook!

name: Mystery Polish!
description: This listing is for a mystery shade. These polishes are not part of my regular line. Most of these colors weren't quite the shade I was going for so I am offering them up at reduced pricing, but the color you receive will be a mystery! The bottles are full and have not been used.
